documents.document: @NetworkRailVIC No problem, a member of staff was going to call the manager tonight but I was in a rush. Will do this tomorrow!
@NetworkRailVIC No, I want to arrange to meet the manager at the station. I don't want to submit a form!
@NetworkRailVIC Hi. Please can you supply me with the station managers name, I want to report a very rude member of staff!
@nationalrailenq @NetworkRailVIC thank you!
@nationalrailenq please give me the name of the manager at London Victoria station, I want to report a rude member of staff!
